welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oud-Turnhout, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our quaint town, known for its stunning nature and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Oud-Turnhout has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi for free for up to 2 hours.
